nodes.text: Horchoba Tuain was a male Mon Calamari commando who served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the time of the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, he was part of an Alliance operation to attack the Imperial Outpost on Talus. Tuain was killed by an Imperial agent sent by Lord Hethrir to stop the attack.

Horchoba Tuain was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
